MERN Stack Development Course

MERN Stack Development course is in high demand. With this course, you’ll become a skilled MERN-stack developer by mastering the MERN stack – MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Learn how to build modern web applications with a powerful front-end framework, interactive user interfaces, and a robust back-end. Whether you’re new to web development or an experienced developer, this course will prepare you to create dynamic web applications from start to finish.

MERN Stack Development Course Details:

Introduction to MERN Stack Development

  • What is the MERN Stack?
  • Benefits of the MERN Stack
  • Role of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js
  • Setting Up the Development Environment

MongoDB – The NoSQL Database

  • Introduction to MongoDB
  • Data Modeling in MongoDB
  • CRUD Operations
  • Aggregation Framework
  • Connecting Node.js with MongoDB

Building a RESTful API with Node.js and Express.js

  • Introduction to Node.js
  • Creating RESTful APIs
  • Handling Requests and Responses
  • Middleware and Routing
  • Error Handling

Front-end Development with React

  • Introduction to React
  • Components and Props
  • State and Lifecycle
  • Handling Events
  • React Router and Navigation

Single-Page Applications (SPAs) with React and React Router

  • Building SPAs with React
  • Client-Side Routing with React Router
  • State Management and Context API
  • User Authentication and Authorization
  • Real-time Data Updates with WebSockets

Connecting React with Node.js and Express.js

  • Integrating React with Express.js
  • Authentication and Security
  • Consuming APIs in React
  • Handling Forms and User Input
  • Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)

Advanced Topics in MERN Stack Development

  • File Upload and Storage
  • Testing and Debugging
  • Performance Optimization
  • Deployment Strategies
  • Best Practices in MERN Stack Development

Real-world MERN Stack Projects

  • Building a Blogging Platform
  • Developing an E-commerce Application
  • Interactive Social Media Application
  • Capstone Project and Presentation

Duration: 6 Months

  • Daily 2 Hrs
  • Week End Extra Practice
  • Career Guidance sessions
  • Week End Batches are also available.

Course Benefits:

  • Hands-on coding exercises and real-world projects
  • Access to MERN stack development tools and libraries
  • Quizzes and assessments for tracking progress
  • Support from an online community forum
  • Course completion certificate

Search Jobs on MERN Stack Development

Prerequisites: Participants should have a basic understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and web development concepts. This course is designed for developers with some prior programming experience.

Who can do MERN Stack Development course:

  • Web developers looking to master full-stack development
  • Front-end developers eager to expand their skills
  • Backend developers interested in building interactive front ends
  • Anyone seeking a comprehensive understanding of the MERN stack
